answer: You can log in to the student portal right here: https://www.gracefulhomeschooling.com/auth/signin.
To reset your password, just click this link: https://www.gracefulhomeschooling.com/auth/reset-password
Please send an email to help@gracefulhomeschooling.com so our admins can assist you properly. Just include name, email used for enrollment and screenshot (if possible).
Please wait within 24-48 hours before our admins can approve your community application (weekends/holidays may take longer). Feel free to browse the student portal resources while you wait!
